columns.name: name
columns.description: The name of the resource.

columns.name: id
columns.description: Fully qualified identifier of the resource.

columns.name: type
columns.description: The resource type.

columns.name: provisioning_state
columns.description: Provisioning state of the event grid topic resource. Possible values include: 'Creating', 'Updating', 'Deleting', 'Succeeded', 'Canceled', 'Failed'.

columns.name: created_at
columns.description: The timestamp of resource creation (UTC).

columns.name: created_by
columns.description: The identity that created the resource.

columns.name: created_by_type
columns.description: The type of identity that created the resource.

columns.name: disable_local_auth
columns.description: This boolean is used to enable or disable local auth. Default value is false. When the property is set to true, only AAD token will be used to authenticate if user is allowed to publish to the topic.

columns.name: endpoint
columns.description: Endpoint for the event grid topic resource which is used for publishing the events.

columns.name: input_schema
columns.description: This determines the format that event grid should expect for incoming events published to the event grid topic resource. Possible values include: 'EventGridSchema', 'CustomEventSchema', 'CloudEventSchemaV10'.

columns.name: kind
columns.description: Kind of the resource.

columns.name: last_modified_at
columns.description: The timestamp of resource last modification (UTC).

columns.name: last_modified_by
columns.description: The identity that last modified the resource.

columns.name: last_modified_by_type
columns.description: The type of identity that last modified the resource.

columns.name: location
columns.description: Location of the resource.

columns.name: public_network_access
columns.description: This determines if traffic is allowed over public network. By default it is enabled.

columns.name: sku_name
columns.description: Name of this SKU. Possible values include: 'Basic', 'Standard'.

columns.name: diagnostic_settings
columns.description: A list of active diagnostic settings for the eventgrid topic.

columns.name: extended_location
columns.description: Extended location of the resource.

columns.name: identity
columns.description: Identity information for the resource.

columns.name: inbound_ip_rules
columns.description: This can be used to restrict traffic from specific IPs instead of all IPs. Note: These are considered only if PublicNetworkAccess is enabled.

columns.name: input_schema_mapping
columns.description: Information about the InputSchemaMapping which specified the info about mapping event payload.

columns.name: private_endpoint_connections
columns.description: List of private endpoint connections for the event grid topic.

columns.name: title
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTitle

columns.name: tags
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTags

columns.name: region
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionRegion

columns.name: resource_group
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionResourceGroup
